title: Pixel 4 XL doesn't boot without being plugged in and then just restarts
content:
Hi guys

I dropped my pixel 4 XL this morning and it just went off. Charging it doesn't do anything. It only turns on when i have it plugged in and then the moment i let go of the power button it turns off again. If i keep the power button pressed in, it just restarts the whole time without getting anywhere apart from the google logo.

Any assistance would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks 
Lorentz
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
